TopicTitle: Is it possible to MM-edit several IVAs onto one part?

Articles.Content:
So I rescaled myself a cockpit. Being so large, I thought it should hold more crew as well. For crew portraits to become visible, I need some kind of IVA. Placeholder will do for that purpose, but now that I've seen it, I cannot un-see.

So I wonder. My rescaled model is by all means large enough to allow for both a cockpit IVA, and a crew cabin IVA. Is it possible to somehow attach both to a single model?

My only means of achieving that is ModuleManager patches.

On ‎11‎/‎25‎/‎2017 at 5:32 AM, Laie said:

So I rescaled myself a cockpit. Being so large, I thought it should hold more crew as well. For crew portraits to become visible, I need some kind of IVA. Placeholder will do for that purpose, but now that I've seen it, I cannot un-see.

So I wonder. My rescaled model is by all means large enough to allow for both a cockpit IVA, and a crew cabin IVA. Is it possible to somehow attach both to a single model?

My only means of achieving that is ModuleManager patches.

I don't see how but you could download unity the free one and add some seats or what ever and set it up for the kerbals to spawn there
